mutants.code:
def find_median(nums):
    count = len(nums)
    is_odd = count | 1
    if is_odd:
        middle_index = count // 2
        median = nums[middle_index]
    else:
        first_middle_index = count // 2 - 1
        second_middle_index = count // 2
        median = (nums[first_middle_index] + nums[second_middle_index]) // 2
    return median
